query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Cantando come donna innamorata, 2 continüò col fin di sue parole: 3 ‘Beati quorum tecta sunt peccata!’.
query.error: **English:** 1 Singing like a woman in love, 2 she continued with the end of her words: 3 ‘Blessed are those whose sins are covered!’
query.result: 1 Bernyanyi seperti wanita yang sedang jatuh cinta, 2 dia melanjutkan dengan akhir dari kata-katanya: 3 ‘Berbahagialah mereka yang dosanya telah ditutupi!’

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 E come ninfe che si givan sole 5 per le salvatiche ombre, disïando 6 qual di veder, qual di fuggir lo sole,
query.error: **English:** 4 And like nymphs who go alone 5 through the wild shadows, desiring 6 one to see, one to flee from the sun,
query.result: 4 Dan seperti nimfa yang berjalan sendirian 5 melalui bayang-bayang liar, menginginkan 6 yang satu untuk melihat, yang satu untuk melarikan diri dari matahari,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 allor si mosse contra ’l fiume, andando 8 su per la riva; e io pari di lei, 9 picciol passo con picciol seguitando.
query.error: **English:** 7 then she moved against the river, walking 8 up along the bank; and I, equal to her, 9 following with small step, with small step.
query.result: 7 lalu dia bergerak melawan sungai, berjalan 8 di sepanjang tepi sungai; dan aku, setara dengannya, 9 mengikuti dengan langkah kecil, dengan langkah kecil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Non eran cento tra ’ suoi passi e ’ miei, 11 quando le ripe igualmente dier volta, 12 per modo ch’a levante mi rendei.
query.error: **English:** 10 My steps and hers were not a hundred yet, 11 when the banks turned equally, 12 so that I turned towards the east.
query.result: 10 Langkahku dan langkahnya belum seratus, 11 ketika tepian-tepian itu sama-sama berbelok, 12 sehingga aku menghadap ke timur.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 Né ancor fu così nostra via molta, 14 quando la donna tutta a me si torse, 15 dicendo: «Frate mio, guarda e ascolta».
query.error: **English:** 13 Our way had not continued very long, 14 when the woman turned to me completely, 15 saying: "My brother, look and listen."
query.result: 13 Jalan kami belum berlanjut lama, 14 ketika wanita itu sepenuhnya berpaling kepadaku, 15 berkata: "Saudaraku, lihat dan dengarkan."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Ed ecco un lustro sùbito trascorse 17 da tutte parti per la gran foresta, 18 tal che di balenar mi mise in forse.
query.error: **English:** 16 And behold, a sudden flash 17 passed through the great forest on all sides, 18 so that it made me doubt if it was lightning.
query.result: 16 Dan lihatlah, kilatan cahaya tiba-tiba melintas 17 dari semua sisi hutan raya, 18 sehingga membuatku ragu apakah itu kilat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Ma perché ’l balenar, come vien, resta, 20 e quel, durando, più e più splendeva, 21 nel mio pensier dicea: ‘Che cosa è questa?’.
query.error: **English:** 19 But why does the lightning, as it comes, remain, 20 and that, enduring, shines more and more brightly, 21 in my thoughts saying: ‘What is this?’.
query.result: 19 Tetapi mengapa kilat, ketika datang, tetap ada, 20 dan itu, bertahan, bersinar lebih dan lebih terang, 21 dalam pikiranku berkata: ‘Apakah ini?’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 E una melodia dolce correva 23 per l’aere luminoso; onde buon zelo 24 mi fé riprender l’ardimento d’Eva,
query.error: **English:** 22 And a sweet melody was flowing 23 through the luminous air; whence a good zeal 24 made me resume the daring of Eve,
query.result: 22 Dan sebuah melodi yang merdu mengalir 23 melalui udara yang terang; oleh karena itu semangat yang baik 24 membuatku melanjutkan keberanian Hawa,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 che là dove ubidia la terra e ’l cielo, 26 femmina, sola e pur testé formata, 27 non sofferse di star sotto alcun velo;
query.error: **English:** 25 who there where earth and heaven obeyed, 26 a woman, alone and just then formed, 27 did not endure to remain under any veil;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
28 sotto ’l qual se divota fosse stata, 29 avrei quelle ineffabili delizie 30 sentite prima e più lunga fïata.
query.error: **English:** 28 under which if she had been devout, 29 I would have felt those ineffable delights 30 first and for a longer time.
query.result: 28 di bawahnya jika dia saleh, 29 aku akan merasakan kenikmatan yang tak terlukiskan itu 30 pertama kali dan lebih lama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
31 Mentr’ io m’andava tra tante primizie 32 de l’etterno piacer tutto sospeso, 33 e disïoso ancora a più letizie,
query.error: **English:** 31 While I was going among so many first fruits 32 of the eternal pleasure, all in suspense, 33 and still desiring more joys,
query.result: 31 Sementara aku berjalan di antara begitu banyak buah sulung 32 dari kesenangan abadi, semuanya dalam ketegangan, 33 dan masih menginginkan lebih banyak kegembiraan,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 dinanzi a noi, tal quale un foco acceso, 35 ci si fé l’aere sotto i verdi rami; 36 e ’l dolce suon per canti era già inteso.
query.error: **English:** 34 before us, like a burning fire, 35 the air became beneath the green boughs; 36 and the sweet sound of singing was already heard.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 O sacrosante Vergini, se fami, 38 freddi o vigilie mai per voi soffersi, 39 cagion mi sprona ch’io mercé vi chiami.
query.error: **English:** 37 O sacred Virgins, if I have ever 38 suffered cold or sleepless nights for you, 39 may the reason that spurs me on to call for your mercy.
query.result: 37 Wahai Dara-Dara yang suci, jika aku pernah 38 menderita kedinginan atau malam tanpa tidur untukmu, 39 semoga alasan yang mendorongku untuk memohon belas kasihanmu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Or convien che Elicona per me versi, 41 e Uranìe m’aiuti col suo coro 42 forti cose a pensar mettere in versi.
query.error: **English:** 40 Now it is fitting that Helicon pour forth for me, 41 and Urania aid me with her choir 42 to think of strong things to put into verse.
query.result: 40 Sekarang sudah sepantasnya Helicon mencurahkan bagiku, 41 dan Urania membantuku dengan paduan suaranya 42 untuk memikirkan hal-hal yang kuat untuk dituangkan ke dalam syair.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Poco più oltre, sette alberi d’oro 44 falsava nel parere il lungo tratto 45 del mezzo ch’era ancor tra noi e loro;
query.error: **English:** 43 A little farther on, seven trees of gold 44 falsified in appearance the long stretch 45 of the plain that was still between us and them;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 ma quand’ i’ fui sì presso di lor fatto, 47 che l’obietto comun, che ’l senso inganna, 48 non perdea per distanza alcun suo atto,
query.error: **English:** 46 but when I had come so near to them 47 that the common object, which deceives the sense, 48 did not lose any of its details because of the distance,
query.result: 46 tetapi ketika aku sudah begitu dekat dengan mereka, 47 sehingga objek umum, yang menipu indra, 48 tidak kehilangan detailnya karena jarak,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
49 la virtù ch’a ragion discorso ammanna, 50 sì com’ elli eran candelabri apprese, 51 e ne le voci del cantare ‘Osanna’.
query.error: **English:** 49 the faculty that rightly prepares discourse 50 perceived that they were candlesticks, 51 and in the voices of the song ‘Hosanna’.
query.result: 49 kemampuan yang secara tepat mempersiapkan wacana 50 memahami bahwa mereka adalah kandil, 51 dan dalam suara nyanyian ‘Hosanna’.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
52 Di sopra fiammeggiava il bello arnese 53 più chiaro assai che luna per sereno 54 di mezza notte nel suo mezzo mese.
query.error: **English:** 52 Above it the beautiful armor was shining 53 much brighter than the moon in a clear sky 54 at midnight in the middle of its month.
query.result: 52 Di atasnya baju besi yang indah itu bersinar 53 jauh lebih terang daripada bulan di langit yang cerah 54 pada tengah malam di pertengahan bulannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 Io mi rivolsi d’ammirazion pieno 56 al buon Virgilio, ed esso mi rispuose 57 con vista carca di stupor non meno.
query.error: **English:** 55 I turned to him, filled with wonder, 56 to the good Virgil, and he answered me 57 with a gaze no less full of astonishment.
query.result: 55 Aku berpaling kepadanya, penuh dengan kekaguman 56 kepada Virgil yang baik, dan dia menjawabku 57 dengan pandangan yang tidak kurang penuh dengan keheranan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 Indi rendei l’aspetto a l’alte cose 59 che si movieno incontr’ a noi sì tardi, 60 che foran vinte da novelle spose.
query.error: **English:** 58 Then turn your attention to the lofty things 59 that move towards us so slowly, 60 that they would be overtaken by newly married brides.
query.result: 58 Kemudian arahkan pandanganmu ke hal-hal yang tinggi 59 yang bergerak ke arah kita dengan sangat lambat, 60 sehingga akan dikalahkan oleh pengantin baru.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
61 La donna mi sgridò: «Perché pur ardi 62 sì ne l’affetto de le vive luci, 63 e ciò che vien di retro a lor non guardi?».
query.error: **English:** 61 The lady scolded me: "Why do you burn so 62 in the affection of the living lights, 63 and do not look at what comes after them?".
query.result: 61 Wanita itu memarahiku: "Mengapa kamu begitu bersemangat 62 dalam kasih sayang cahaya yang hidup, 63 dan tidak melihat apa yang datang setelah mereka?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Genti vid’ io allor, come a lor duci, 65 venire appresso, vestite di bianco; 66 e tal candor di qua già mai non fuci.
query.error: **English:** 64 Then I saw ladies, as it seemed to me, 65 coming behind, dressed in white; 66 and such whiteness was never seen here on earth.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 L’acqua imprendëa dal sinistro fianco, 68 e rendea me la mia sinistra costa, 69 s’io riguardava in lei, come specchio anco.
query.error: **English:** 67 The water took hold of me on my left side, 68 and it made my left side damp, 69 if I looked into it, like a mirror also.
query.result: 67 Air itu memegangku di sisi kiriku, 68 dan membasahi sisi kiriku, 69 jika aku melihat ke dalamnya, seperti cermin juga.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Quand’ io da la mia riva ebbi tal posta, 71 che solo il fiume mi facea distante, 72 per veder meglio ai passi diedi sosta,
query.error: **English:** 70 When from my bank I had such a position, 71 that only the river made me distant, 72 to see better I paused my steps,
query.result: 70 Ketika dari tepianku aku memiliki posisi seperti itu, 71 sehingga hanya sungai yang membuatku jauh, 72 untuk melihat lebih baik aku menghentikan langkahku,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 e vidi le fiammelle andar davante, 74 lasciando dietro a sé l’aere dipinto, 75 e di tratti pennelli avean sembiante;
query.error: **English:** 73 and I saw the flames go before me, 74 leaving behind them the painted air, 75 and they had the appearance of drawn brushes;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
76 sì che lì sopra rimanea distinto 77 di sette liste, tutte in quei colori 78 onde fa l’arco il Sole e Delia il cinto.
query.error: **English:** 76 so that above them remained distinct 77 seven bands, all in those colors 78 from which the Sun makes the rainbow and Delia her girdle.
query.result: 76 sehingga di atas mereka tetap berbeda 77 tujuh garis, semuanya dalam warna-warna itu 78 dari mana Matahari membuat pelangi dan Delia ikat pinggangnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Questi ostendali in dietro eran maggiori 80 che la mia vista; e, quanto a mio avviso, 81 diece passi distavan quei di fori.
query.error: **English:** 79 These parapets were higher behind 80 than my sight; and, as far as I could tell, 81 those on the outside were ten paces distant.
query.result: 79 Tembok pembatas ini di belakang lebih tinggi 80 daripada penglihatanku; dan, sejauh yang kulihat, 81 yang di luar berjarak sepuluh langkah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 Sotto così bel ciel com’ io diviso, 83 ventiquattro seniori, a due a due, 84 coronati venien di fiordaliso.
query.error: **English:** 82 Under so beautiful a sky as I described, 83 twenty-four elders, two by two, 84 crowned with fleur-de-lis, were coming.
query.result: 82 Di bawah langit yang begitu indah seperti yang kugambarkan, 83 dua puluh empat penatua, dua demi dua, 84 bermahkotakan fleur-de-lis, sedang datang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
85 Tutti cantavan: «Benedicta tue 86 ne le figlie d’Adamo, e benedette 87 sieno in etterno le bellezze tue!».
query.error: **English:** 85 All sang: "Blessed are you 86 among the daughters of Adam, and blessed 87 forever be your beauties!".
query.result: 85 Semua bernyanyi: "Diberkatilah engkau 86 di antara para putri Adam, dan diberkatilah 87 selamanya kecantikanmu!".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Poscia che i fiori e l’altre fresche erbette 89 a rimpetto di me da l’altra sponda 90 libere fuor da quelle genti elette,
query.error: **English:** 88 After the flowers and the other fresh grasses 89 opposite me on the other bank 90 were free from those chosen people,
query.result: 88 Setelah bunga-bunga dan rerumputan segar lainnya 89 di seberangku di tepi sungai yang lain 90 bebas dari orang-orang pilihan itu,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 sì come luce luce in ciel seconda, 92 vennero appresso lor quattro animali, 93 coronati ciascun di verde fronda.
query.error: **English:** 91 just as one light follows another in the sky, 92 four animals came after them, 93 each crowned with a green garland.
query.result: 91 bagaikan cahaya mengikuti cahaya di langit, 92 empat binatang datang setelah mereka, 93 masing-masing dimahkotai dengan karangan bunga hijau.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
94 Ognuno era pennuto di sei ali; 95 le penne piene d’occhi; e li occhi d’Argo, 96 se fosser vivi, sarebber cotali.
query.error: **English:** 94 Each one was adorned with six wings; 95 the feathers full of eyes; and the eyes of Argus, 96 if they were alive, would be like these.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 A descriver lor forme più non spargo 98 rime, lettor; ch’altra spesa mi strigne, 99 tanto ch’a questa non posso esser largo;
query.error: **English:** 97 To describe their forms, I no longer scatter 98 rhymes, reader, for another task constrains me, 99 so much that I cannot be generous with this one;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 ma leggi Ezechïel, che li dipigne 101 come li vide da la fredda parte 102 venir con vento e con nube e con igne;
query.error: **English:** 100 but read Ezekiel, who depicts them 101 as he saw them come from the cold region 102 with wind and cloud and fire;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 e quali i troverai ne le sue carte, 104 tali eran quivi, salvo ch’a le penne 105 Giovanni è meco e da lui si diparte.
query.error: **English:** 103 and as you will find them in his writings, 104 such were they here, except that, as to their wings, 105 John is with me, and from him they differ.
query.result: 103 dan seperti yang akan kamu temukan dalam tulisannya, 104 demikianlah mereka di sini, kecuali bahwa, mengenai sayap mereka, 105 Yohanes bersamaku, dan dari dialah mereka berbeda.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Lo spazio dentro a lor quattro contenne 107 un carro, in su due rote, trïunfale, 108 ch’al collo d’un grifon tirato venne.
query.error: **English:** 106 The space within them contained 107 a triumphal chariot on two wheels, 108 which was drawn by a griffin by the neck.
query.result: 106 Ruang di dalam mereka berempat berisi 107 sebuah kereta perang, di atas dua roda, 108 yang ditarik oleh seekor griffin di lehernya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Esso tendeva in sù l’una e l’altra ale 110 tra la mezzana e le tre e tre liste, 111 sì ch’a nulla, fendendo, facea male.
query.error: **English:** 109 It held its wings spread out and raised 110 between the middle and the three and three lists, 111 so that, cleaving the air, it caused no harm to anything.
query.result: 109 Ia mengembangkan sayapnya ke atas dan ke bawah 110 di antara tengah dan tiga dan tiga garis, 111 sehingga, dengan membelah udara, ia tidak menyebabkan kerugian apa pun.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Tanto salivan che non eran viste; 113 le membra d’oro avea quant’ era uccello, 114 e bianche l’altre, di vermiglio miste.
query.error: **English:** 112 They flew so high that they could not be seen; 113 the parts that were gold were as large as a bird, 114 and the other parts were white, mixed with red.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 Non che Roma di carro così bello 116 rallegrasse Affricano, o vero Augusto, 117 ma quel del Sol saria pover con ello;
query.error: **English:** 115 Not that Rome rejoiced Africanus, or even Augustus, with a chariot so beautiful, 116 but that of the Sun would be poor compared to it; 117 that of the Sun which, swerving, was burnt

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 quel del Sol che, svïando, fu combusto 119 per l’orazion de la Terra devota, 120 quando fu Giove arcanamente giusto.
query.error: **English:** 118 that of the Sun, which, while wandering, was consumed 119 by the prayer of the devout Earth, 120 when Jove was secretly just.
query.result: 118 matahari yang, saat mengembara, terbakar 119 oleh doa Bumi yang saleh, 120 ketika Jupiter secara diam-diam adil.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
121 Tre donne in giro da la destra rota 122 venian danzando; l’una tanto rossa 123 ch’a pena fora dentro al foco nota;
query.error: **English:** 121 Three women were circling on the right side, 122 dancing; one so red 123 that she would hardly have been noticed inside a fire;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 e or parëan da la bianca tratte, 128 or da la rossa; e dal canto di questa 129 l’altre toglien l’andare e tarde e ratte.
query.error: **English:** 127 and now they seemed led by the white one, 128 now by the red one; and from the song of this one 129 the others took their steps, slow and fast.
query.result: 127 dan sekarang mereka tampak dipimpin oleh yang putih, 128 sekarang oleh yang merah; dan dari nyanyian yang ini 129 yang lain mengambil langkah mereka, lambat dan cepat.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
130 Da la sinistra quattro facean festa, 131 in porpore vestite, dietro al modo 132 d’una di lor ch’avea tre occhi in testa.
query.error: **English:** 130 On the left, four of them were celebrating, 131 dressed in purple, following the fashion 132 of one of them who had three eyes in her head.
query.result: 130 Di sebelah kiri, empat dari mereka sedang berpesta, 131 berpakaian ungu, mengikuti gaya 132 salah satu dari mereka yang memiliki tiga mata di kepalanya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Appresso tutto il pertrattato nodo 134 vidi due vecchi in abito dispari, 135 ma pari in atto e onesto e sodo.
query.error: **English:** 133 After all the knotty argument 134 I saw two elders in different clothing, 135 but equal in demeanor, dignified and steadfast.
query.result: 133 Setelah semua argumen yang rumit 134 aku melihat dua orang tua dengan pakaian yang berbeda, 135 tetapi sama dalam sikap, bermartabat dan teguh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 L’un si mostrava alcun de’ famigliari 137 di quel sommo Ipocràte che natura 138 a li animali fé ch’ell’ ha più cari;
query.error: **English:** 136 One of them showed himself to be one of the household 137 of that great Hippocrates whom nature 138 made for the animals she holds most dear;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
139 mostrava l’altro la contraria cura 140 con una spada lucida e aguta, 141 tal che di qua dal rio mi fé paura.
query.error: **English:** 139 the other showed the opposite concern 140 with a shining and sharp sword, 141 such that it frightened me on this side of the river.
query.result: 139 yang satu lagi menunjukkan keprihatinan yang bertentangan 140 dengan sebilah pedang yang bersinar dan tajam, 141 sehinggakan ia menakutkan aku di seberang sungai ini.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
142 Poi vidi quattro in umile paruta; 143 e di retro da tutti un vecchio solo 144 venir, dormendo, con la faccia arguta.
query.error: **English:** 142 Then I saw four in humble dress; 143 and behind all of them, an old man alone 144 coming, sleeping, with a sharp face.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
145 E questi sette col primaio stuolo 146 erano abitüati, ma di gigli 147 dintorno al capo non facëan brolo,
query.error: **English:** 145 And these seven with the first band 146 were adorned, but with lilies 147 around their heads they did not make a garland,
query.result: 145 Dan ketujuh ini dengan kelompok pertama 146 dihiasi, tetapi dengan bunga bakung 147 di sekeliling kepala mereka tidak membuat karangan bunga,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
148 anzi di rose e d’altri fior vermigli; 149 giurato avria poco lontano aspetto 150 che tutti ardesser di sopra da’ cigli.
query.error: **English:** 148 rather with roses and other crimson flowers; 149 one would have sworn, looking from a distance, 150 that they were all burning from above their brows.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
151 E quando il carro a me fu a rimpetto, 152 un tuon s’udì, e quelle genti degne 153 parvero aver l’andar più interdetto,
query.error: **English:** 151 And when the chariot was opposite me, 152 a thunderclap was heard, and those worthy people 153 seemed to have their progress more impeded,
query.result: 151 Dan ketika kereta itu berada di hadapanku, 152 terdengarlah suara guntur, dan orang-orang yang mulia itu 153 tampak semakin terhalang kemajuannya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
154 fermandosi ivi con le prime insegne.
query.error: **English:** 154 stopping there with the foremost banners.
query.result: 154 berhenti di sana dengan panji-panji terdepan.
